product_name: Patagonia Torrentshell Rain Jacket - Girls' - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Don't let a rainy day dampen spirits. The girls' Patagonia Torrentshell rain jacket lets young adventurers have fun in any weather. Jacket is a 2.5-layer, ripstop nylon with a H2No(R) waterproof breathable barrier that blocks wind and water on the outside yet allows perspiration to escape. Patagonia Deluge(R) Durable Water Repellent finish and sealed seams block rain. Attached hood with visor and elastic sides, stormflap, adjustable elastic cuffs and an internal drawcord at the hem provide additional resistance to precipitation and wind. The Patagonia Torrentshell rain jacket for girls features zippered side pockets and 2 inside drop-in pockets. Closeout.
short_description: Don't let a rainy day dampen spirits. The girls' Patagonia Torrentshell rain jacket lets young adventurers have fun in any weather.
